markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Grand Council Bureaucrat](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=53)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 22 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Region** Absalom and Starstone Isle

</column>

You spent years working as a clerk to a functionary in Absalom’s government. Your service taught you a thing or two about rousing speeches and manipulating the city’s bureaucracy.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma
or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill, and the [Government Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Group Impression](/Feats.aspx?ID=789) skill feat.
name: Grand Council Bureaucrat

text: Grand Council Bureaucrat Source World Guide pg. 22 2.0 Region Absalom and Starstone Isle You spent years working as a clerk to a functionary in Absalom’s government. Your service taught you a thing or two about rousing speeches and manipulating the city’s bureaucracy. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Charisma or Intelligence, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Diplomacy skill, and the Government Lore skill. You gain the Group Impression skill feat.
